title: Never Before Seen Pictures Of A Secretly Pregnant Marilyn Monroe | 103.5 KTU
text:
Never Before Seen Pictures Of A Secretly Pregnant Marilyn Monroe 7 hours ago share 
The Internet is going crazy for these never before seen photos of Marilyn Monroe pregnant! 
Monroe's friend Frieda Hull has always kept the color photos she took of Marilyn's baby bump private, however the pictures were sold as part of Frieda's estate last year. The pictures were taken in 1960 in NYC when Marilyn was just 34 years old. The Daily Mail is reporting that Monroe was pregnant with French actor: Yves Montand . 
Frieda Hull became close to the star while part of a group of fans known as the Monroe Six. She named the photos "the pregnant slides" as a note to the secret kept right up until Monroe's death. A friend or Frieda's, Tony Michaels , bought the photos at a 'once in a lifetime' Marilyn Memorabilia Auction. Frieda had told Michaela that Monroe lost the baby, but it was never made clear whether that was by miscarriage or possibly an abortion! 
Take a look at the photo's below: A post shared by @caitlincahillx on Feb 15, 2017 at 11:45am PST A post shared by heldien (@br.heldien) on Feb 15, 2017 at 11:58am PST A post shared by heldien (@br.heldien) on Feb 15, 2017 at 11:59am PST
